{{Spoiler}} {{quote|A fearsome Attacker combining dynamic elemental attacks with reliable support.|Class menu description}} [[File:Royal Summoner Class Icon.png|thumb|180px|The Royal Summoner class icon]] '''Royal Summoner''' is a [[Keves]]i [[Attacker]] [[Class (XC3)|class]] in {{XC3}}. == Overview == Royal Summoner is the class of [[Melia]]. The [[Blade (XC3)|Blade]] of the Royal Summoner class is the Elemental Staff, which is Melia's [[World Ender]] from {{XCFC}}. It is unlocked by going to the [[Main Castle Gate]] in [[Keves Castle]] after completing the main story, or in [[New Game + (XC3)|New Game +]]. Completing the [[Hero Quest|Ascension Quest]] ''[[From Atop Her Throne]]'' will increase this class's rank limit from 10 to 20. === Element Mechanics === The Royal Summoner class has an unexplained mechanic known as '''Elemental Buffs''', which are associated with the elementals created using the Summon Element art, and are applied to the whole party. Arts belonging to the class that don't discharge elements summon elements at random: *'''Flare Elementals''' give +5% damage to nearby allies per orb; *'''Earth Elementals''' give +5% damage reduction to nearby allies per orb; *'''Aqua Elementals''' heal nearby allies by 1% of their maximum HP (per orb) every three seconds. These elemental buffs are affected by the "'''Here I Shall Stand'''" class ability, which increases elemental buff effects by 30%-50% depending on [[Class Rank (XC3)|Class Rank]]. Multiple elementals on the same character stack, however, if multiple characters have the same type of elemental, only the closest character (by distance) will provide their buffs to a given party member. Each elemental also has a separate effect when discharged using Elemental Discharge or Elemental Genesis: *Flare Elementals give an AOE effect centered on the targeted enemy at a 200% power multiplier; *Earth Elementals apply a [[Toxin]] debuff to a single target at a 200% power multiplier; *Aqua Elementals hit one target at a 150% power multiplier, and heal nearby allies for 10% of the damage dealt (to a maximum of the user's Healing Power). These elemental discharges are affected by the "'''Here I Shall Stand'''" class ability, which increases elemental damage by 60%-100% depending on [[Class Rank (XC3)|Class Rank]]. The discharge effect occurs after the initial hit of the Art, and occurs for each elemental held by the user. For example, with 3 Flare elements, the initial hit of Elemental Discharge would occur, followed by 3 AOE hits as a result of the Flare orbs. Elements' damage is not considered to be part of the Art, and thus do not benefit from buffs or equipment that affect Arts. A party member can only have up to three elementals at once; if more are summoned, the oldest ones will be automatically discharged. {{clr}} ==Class Aptitude and Unlock Requirements== {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:100%; valign:center;" !Party Member |[[File:Icon chara battle n0ah.png|60px]]
